edu.uci.nomoads.prediction

Class ServerDPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.nomoads.prediction.ServerDPI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DPIInterface

    class ServerDPI
extends java.lang.Object
implements DPIInterface
    A naive implementation of DPI: searches a given packet for all provided searchStrings in multiple passes of the packet. This could be improved with an implementation of the Aho-Corasick algorithm, but the speed is not as crucial on a server. AntMonitor provides a very efficient Aho-Corasick implementation for when this library is used on the mobile device.

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> search(java.nio.ByteBuffer packet,
                                                    int size)
        Perform DPI on the given packet, searching for strings that were passed in previously in the init method
        Specified by:
        search in interface DPIInterface
        Parameters:
        packet - a ByteBuffer containing the packet
        size - size of the packet
        Returns:
        a list of strings found. Each string is followed by the ending position of where it was found in the packet.
